jaca.android.tools
Class CallManager

java.lang.Object
  cartago.Artifact
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaArtifact
          jaca.android.dev.TelephonyManagerArtifact
              jaca.android.tools.CallManager

public class CallManager
extends TelephonyManagerArtifact

Artifact enabling agents to monitoring incoming call and call state

Require the permission android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE

#### Observable Properties #####

  • call_state(State). State = {"idle", "offhook", "ringing"}
  • incoming_number(Number). Number = An int representing the incoming number

#### Observable Events #####

  • ringing(Source). Source = A String representing the source of the incoming call
  • offhook. Event generated after a call offhook
  • idle. Event generated once the device become idle

Author:
mguidi
